official_title: A bill to extend by seven months the expiration date of the Defense Production Act of 1950.

summary.text: Amends the Defense Production Act of 1950 to extend its expiration date for seven months, from March 31, 1983 to October 31, 1983.

titles.title: A bill to extend by seven months the expiration date of the Defense Production Act of 1950.
